title: phttp
description: Non-Blocking HTTP server in 'C' language, I learned socket programming and also how to work HTTP.

title: zigstr
description: String library in Zig language, I learned how to work with strings in Zig.

title: casm
description: x86_64 / amd64 Instruction Set Architecture Assembler, casm is my hobby / experimental project, casm is three binary format support Raw Binary, Bootloader, and ELF64.

title: canvaslib
description: Small library for html canvas manipulation, using it you can move the canvas text and image by mouse pointer.

title: Slect
description: Web Interface for server / VPS, Slect is my final year college project, using it you can remotely access your Server os VPS, But this project is deprecated.
